House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00522
FULL TITLE : AN ACT STRENGTHENING THE POLITICAL PARTY SYSTEM AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : The Political Party Development Act Of 2016
ABSTRACT : Institutionalizes reforms in the financing of electoral campaigns, so as to promote accountability and transparency; promotes party loyalty and discipline; and encourages and supports continuing voter’s education and civic literacy programs through the political parties.
